balanceinquiryinfo.OH: Actual physical inventory quantity present in this retail enterprise or Location Group Hierarchy structure
balanceinquiryinfo.ALLOC: Stock allocated to Orders, i.e. Customer Pickups, Store Transfers reserved Stock reserved for Orders
balanceinquiryinfo.HEL: 'Held' (stock held for various reasons, i.e. investigation of product condition)
balanceinquiryinfo.RTV: Stock being sent back to vendor
balanceinquiryinfo.ATS: Available to Sell - Quantity available for sale, which considers current On Hand, Inventory Transfer Out, Allocated and Reserved
balanceinquiryinfo.ATP: Available to Promise - Quantity that can be promised to the Customer based on current On Hand, Open On-Order In, Transfer In, Inventory Transfer Out, Allocated and Reserved quantities
balanceinquiryinfo.WAC: Weighted Average Cost - Cost of goods available for SALE divided by the Number of Units available for SALE
balanceinquiryinfo.ORDER: Stock On Order incoming for the receiving store
balanceinquiryinfo.UNCONFOR: Inbound orders, stock with temporary rejection
balanceinquiryinfo.CONFOR: Confirmed incoming amount promised to the order
balanceinquiryinfo.REJ: Inbound orders, stock with hard rejection
balanceinquiryinfo.ASN: Advanced Shipment Notification, actual incoming delivery amount being expected in for this order
balanceinquiryinfo.TRANS: In-transit inbound amount expected for this transfer
balanceinquiryinfo.OPEN: Stock on Orders from the sending store
balanceinquiryinfo.UNCONFO: Outbound orders, stock with temporary rejection
balanceinquiryinfo.CON: Confirmed outbound amount promised to the order
balanceinquiryinfo.REJO: Outbound orders, stock with hard rejection
balanceinquiryinfo.ASNIN: Advanced Shipment Notification, actual outbound amount being sent for this order
balanceinquiryinfo.TRANSIT: In-transit outbound amount being sent for this transfer
